articles.title: This Social Enterprise Backed By Swire And Nan Fung’s Chen Family Is Teaching Emotional Education In Exam-Obsessed Hong Kong
articles.description: The lack of emotional education in Hong Kong's exam-oriented system inspired Anthony Ngai, Matthew Kwok and Raymond Yang to establish Just Feel.
articles.content:
Just Feel cofounders (left to right): Anthony Ngai, Matthew Kwok and Raymond Yang.

articles.title: Horse and sports betting market to grow by USD 171.87 million from 2022 to 2027 | Increasing digital connectivity drives market growth - Technavio
